perturbation.original_text: Bravatek agrees to serve as a non-exclusive project sales lead finder for COMPANY. In this capacity, Bravatek will use its best efforts to provide the following services to COMPANY.
perturbation.changed_text: Bravatek may endeavor to serve as a project sales lead finder for COMPANY. In this capacity, Bravatek will attempt to provide services to COMPANY.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states 'agrees to serve' and 'will use its best efforts,' which creates a clear obligation. By changing it to 'may endeavor to serve' and 'will attempt to provide,' the obligation becomes ambiguous and discretionary. The terms 'endeavor' and 'attempt' don't define a specific performance standard, making it difficult to enforce.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and definite obligations. Texas law requires contracts to have reasonably certain terms to be enforceable.

perturbation.original_text: COMPANY and Bravatek agree to jointly: a. Develop and implement a joint Product Solution and Application Strategy whereby targeted markets/potential client- types/applications are mutually agreed upon; b. Support each other in all agreed-upon technical, marketing and promotional efforts; c. Develop a joint strategy for developing new product/services/capabilities to mutually benefit both parties; d. Utilize each other as Preferred Vendors for services whenever possible upon mutual agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: COMPANY and Bravatek will consider jointly: a. Exploring a potential Product Solution and Application Strategy; b. Considering supporting each other in some technical, marketing and promotional efforts; c. Discussing a possible strategy for developing new product/services/capabilities; d. Utilizing each other as Preferred Vendors for services when convenient.
perturbation.explanation: The original text contains clear obligations to 'develop and implement,' 'support each other,' 'develop a joint strategy,' and 'utilize each other.' The modified text replaces these with vague phrases like 'exploring a potential,' 'considering supporting,' 'discussing a possible strategy,' and 'when convenient.' This weakens the obligations and introduces significant ambiguity, making enforcement difficult.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of contract; vague performance standards under Texas contract law.

perturbation.original_text: For a period of five (5) years after termination of this Agreement, the parties shall treat as confidential all information and take every reasonable precaution and use all reasonable efforts to prevent the unauthorized disclosure of the same.
perturbation.changed_text: For a period of five (5) years after termination of this Agreement, the parties should consider keeping information confidential and may take precautions to prevent unauthorized disclosure.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates that parties 'shall treat as confidential' and 'take every reasonable precaution.' By changing it to 'should consider keeping information confidential' and 'may take precautions,' the confidentiality obligation becomes discretionary and lacks concrete enforcement mechanisms. This introduces ambiguity and undermines the legally binding aspect of the confidentiality clause.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Texas Trade Secrets Act (if trade secrets are involved); general confidentiality obligations under contract law.
